metadata.Name: SberQuAD
metadata.Description: SberQuAD is a large-scale Russian reading comprehension dataset, analogous to the Stanford Question Answering Dataset (SQuAD). It contains over 50,000 question-answer pairs based on paragraphs from Russian Wikipedia. The dataset was created by crowdworkers who formulated questions for given paragraphs, with the answer being a contiguous span of text from the paragraph. It was originally developed for a question answering competition hosted by Sberbank.
metadata.Paper Title: SberQuAD -- Russian Reading Comprehension Dataset: Description and Analysis
metadata.Venue Title: Proceedings of the 12th Language Resources and Evaluation Conference
metadata.Abstract: SberQuAD---a large scale analog of Stanford SQuAD in the Russian language---is a valuable resource that has not been properly presented to the scientific community. We fill this gap by providing a description, a thorough analysis, and baseline experimental results.
